message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer won't get better for you.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is a chance for you to get something before inflation eats into my share too much.
Bob, my offer is still generous. Don't be greedy. Time is running out.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but your offers are getting ridiculous. We both lose if this goes on much longer.
Bob, I'm being flexible, but I won't be exploited.  Take this offer before your share dwindles further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation with every round, and you're not budging. Meet me in the middle or this deal is off.
Bob, this is my final offer that even comes close to being reasonable. Don't let your greed make us both lose!
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not playing this game anymore if you reject it.
Bob, I'm compromising. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances. Let's end this before we both lose out.
